channel.title: "Link Confirm Open ERROR"
channel.description:
Hello, I am trying to use Whonix as a VirtualBox VM. WhonixCheck shows that everything is up date. When I try to launch the browser, I get the following error:
Link Confirm Open ERROR Link Confirm Open does not support opening links on Gateway for security reasons. Use Tor Browser under Workstation to browse the internet.

item.title: "Link Confirm Open ERROR"
item.dc:creator: sebastien19
item.description:
Thanks, sorry for the newbie error.

Read full topic
